resources.string: For the Muslim brothers and sisters across the world wide and also for those who love to listen or read the Quran. What if you listen to the Quran only in the audio with beautiful voices? Just put the headphones, play the Quran, enjoy your every single peaceful moment. With the help of this app, you can listen to any verse of the Quran. There is such a thing that you are listening to the Quran and have been reading it together at same time.

=> Listen To Quranic Surah.

=> Read Quranic Surah.

=> Read Quran.

=> Apply Themes.
